page.title: 04Aylesmore Court
page.content: {Aylesmore Court }is owned by Mr and Mrs Arnott.Mr Arnott uses the{Old {Aylesmore Court} as a{granary} for his cattle.He has got Jersey cows and a couple of Friesians.Altogether he has got{148 cows}including a few lovely calves.It takes Mr Arnott two and a half hours in the morning and at night to milk all of his cows.They store all the bottles of milk in a big fridge freezer.So they don't get mixed up the milk bottles have the people's names on.Mr Arnott gives some milk that's spare to the baby calves.There is an {Old Aylesmore Court}and a new one.
